description:
Isuzu, who is plotting to completely revolutionize the Metus, takes his men out for a team-building lunch. Even Beyond participates, and although he is extremely suspicious at first, he finds himself thrilled at the restaurant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE STONE MONUMENT / DICTATOR CADILLAC
